titleStmt.title: A Narrative of the proceedings of Sir Edmond Androsse and his complices, who acted by an illegal and arbitrary commission from the late K. James, during his government in New England by several gentlemen who were of his council.
titleStmt.author: Stoughton, William, 1632-1701.
Mather, Increase, 1639-1723.

titleStmt.title: A Narrative of the proceedings of Sir Edmond Androsse and his complices, who acted by an illegal and arbitrary commission from the late K. James, during his government in New England by several gentlemen who were of his council.
titleStmt.author: Stoughton, William, 1632-1701.
Mather, Increase, 1639-1723.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 12: William Stoughton, Thomas Hinckley, Wart. Winthrop, Barthol. Gedney, Samuel Shrimpton.
Sometimes also ascribed to Increase Mather. Cf. Evans 572.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
